channel.title: My Projectiles #2!... Help PLEASE?
channel.description:
Okay this is the second post ive made on my projectiles... From a distance when i attack someone, with the bow ive added the projectiles to, the arrows fly through the air and hit the player.. (awesome).. But.. After its done that ONCE... It stops attacking the player... Then, when the player moves towards me.. Like to the square infront of me, it starts attacking, like normal, just 1 arrow, with no gfx... Would there be a way to like.. Say.. Loop the projectile? So when im attacking from a distance, it would shoot the projectile (W\) GFX.. But carry on doing that, without stopping... Obviously i'd want a short pause, like.. 3-5 seconds maybe... I just really need this working... If there is a way to loop the gfx projectiles, please do say how on here... I has worked very hard on this :) Lol i dont know why but i added [code] if (LoopAttDelay <= 1); [/code] It was worth a go :P.. But didn't work... And as you see by my posting, im not the best coder in the world... And i have tried alot... So dont post if your just going to have a go at me, or you dont know what your doing... I really need helpful posts :S...
OO 1 more thing... The arrows when they come out of the bow.. As 2 arrows because its "Dark Bow"... One arrows goes to the enemy, but sometimes the other arrow flies off any direction.. How can i make it so it ALWAYS!... Hits the player im attacking?...
Thanks

could you post the arrow fix o_O i got like… rapid fire arrows…lol

item.title: My Projectiles #2!... Help PLEASE?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Mmk, ill give it a go[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 10:17:59 AM[/size][hr]Still no posts…?

~ Looking how to loop a projectile… ~… If thats possible…

Breif reminder of problem: When i attack from a distance, it does the projectile with the GFX – 2 arrows --…
But once its done that, it stops attacking… Then when the enemy moves closer, like 1 square in front of me, it starts attacking again, but with no double projectile?.. Just 1 normal arrow…
Please anyone?

FIXED: The arrow problem, :D…

Read full topic

item.title: My Projectiles #2!... Help PLEASE?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I have… =S…

OH WAIT YOU MIGHT HAVE SOLVED MY PROB… Gimme a sec. ILL POST IF IT DONT WORK.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 08:32:09 AM[/size][hr]My Crystal bow, LOOPS the GFX… And i found, LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+10?..

Hm?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 08:33:33 AM[/size][hr]Nah i can’t seem to find it…

I also have another problem…
[HELP] PLOX :(…

Okay… I added this
Under

public void CheckArrowtype()

I added this at the bottom of that void…

else if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4172){
arrowtype == 9; //Darrow

Then, part way down, below

public void CheckArrows()

I see.

else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212 || playerEquipment[playerArrow] == 892 ..

ETC…
Under that i added…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 || playerEquipment[playerArrow] == 4172){

And this at the bottom of

public void RangeHitDiff()
if (arrowtype == 9); {
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(8);
}
}
}

(Got no errors)
Now this is really weird… When i attack on the my account “OWNER” It works… But every time it hits the enemy, the arrows CHANGE… Because the arrows are 4172 - Broad arrows - Slayer item…
The arrows change to different items… Ive had salt bag, face mask, leaf bladed spear, ear muffs, LOADS… And this KEEPS happening… Now, when i get off my account, and go to someone elses… With the same arrows… same bow… It says (You dont have any arrows equipped) or what ever the mesage it… Can someone help me fix it? The item changing, the message n all. Plz

Read full topic

item.title: My Projectiles #2!... Help PLEASE?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

if(actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 20; }

see this is the code for actions from a player. ( no this will not loop the gfx, i tried myself on my projectiles and it didnt work lol.

look at how action timer is define, break it down, and create your loop delay ints and methods. and when you do, post teh code here and ill test with you lol. becuase my arrows kinda… rapid fire?

Read full topic

item.title: My Projectiles #2!... Help PLEASE?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

I don’t think it’s just possible to do that. If you find any Loops or Repeat in the server client.java. Look at the code and see if you can use it for your issue. For example when searching haystacks. The emotion loops or repeats itself. SO look at some of the coding you already have first.

Read full topic
